content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: andesite_wall
inventory=[{"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 3, "index": 19}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 19, "index": 28}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_stone", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 29, "index": 39}, {"type": "magenta_dye", "quantity": 48, "index": 42}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft an andesite wall. An andesite wall requires placing 6 andesite side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the diorite from slot 19 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Since the diorite has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the cobblestone to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the cobblestone to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 2 with quantity 1
